Layer.PlaySoundCommand: %function(self) StartNumber = math.random(1,2) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then if StartNumber == 1 then SOUND:PlayOnce( THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, '', 'Internal/go/action') ) elseif StartNumber == 2 then SOUND:PlayOnce( THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, '', 'Internal/go/go!') ) else SOUND:PlayOnce( THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, '', 'Internal/go/action') ) end end end
